Description:
Detects execution of "VSDiagnostics.exe" with the "start" command in order to launch and proxy arbitrary binaries.

Author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Potential Binary Proxy Execution Via VSDiagnostics.EXE
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where ((process_path like '%\vsdiagnostics.exe' and original_file_name = 'vsdiagnostics.exe') and command like '%start%' and (command like '% /launch:%' or command like '% -launch:%'))
